title: Can’t Nobody Be That In Love
itunes:title: Can’t Nobody Be That In Love
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I’m a 37 year old single lady and I work with a married couple that gets on my last nerve. They’re the most happy couple in the world and they love to rub their relationship in everyone’s faces. We’ve all recently returned to the office and our boss let them share an office. They love to announce to everyone that they’re going to lunch and they walk around holding hands at all times and making flirty gestures when they’re around us...................

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
